events.name: Critical stage of US-China ties
events.wd_description: Chinese Defense Minister Wei Fenghe stated that US-China ties were at a critical stage and called on the US to improve the bilateral relationship while rejecting US accusations and threats.
events.description: Chinese Defense Minister Wei Fenghe stated that US-China ties were at a critical stage and called on the US to improve the bilateral relationship while rejecting US accusations and threats.

events.name: Wei Fenghe's statement
events.wd_description: Wei Fenghe said it was up to the US to improve the bilateral relationship and firmly rejected US smearing, accusations, and threats.
events.description: Wei Fenghe said it was up to the US to improve the bilateral relationship and firmly rejected US smearing, accusations, and threats.

events.name: Lloyd Austin's response
events.wd_description: Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin noted the increasing number of unsafe encounters between Chinese and other countries' planes and vessels, reaffirming US support for its allies, including Taiwan.
events.description: Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin noted the increasing number of unsafe encounters between Chinese and other countries' planes and vessels, reaffirming US support for its allies, including Taiwan.

events.name: Russia-Ukraine discussion
events.wd_description: At the meeting, Wei stated that China supported peace talks in Ukraine and opposed maximum pressure tactics, clarifying that China had not provided material support to Russia.
events.description: At the meeting, Wei stated that China supported peace talks in Ukraine and opposed maximum pressure tactics, clarifying that China had not provided material support to Russia.

events.name: Expert analysis
events.wd_description: Meia Nouwens, a senior fellow at the International Institute for Strategic Studies, noted that Wei's speech was consistent with Beijing's stance on the Russia-Ukraine issue.
events.description: Meia Nouwens, a senior fellow at the International Institute for Strategic Studies, noted that Wei's speech was consistent with Beijing's stance on the Russia-Ukraine issue.

events.name: Resignation of Boris Bondarev
events.wd_description: Boris Bondarev, a counselor at the Russian permanent mission to the UN in Geneva, resigned from his position, criticizing Putin's war as aggressive and based on lies.
events.description: Boris Bondarev, a counselor at the Russian permanent mission to the UN in Geneva, resigned from his position, criticizing Putin's war as aggressive and based on lies.

events.name: Bondarev's resignation
events.wd_description: Bondarev, the counselor on arms control, is the only high-level diplomat to resign from the Russian foreign ministry since the war began in February.
events.description: Bondarev, the counselor on arms control, is the only high-level diplomat to resign from the Russian foreign ministry since the war began in February.

events.name: Bondarev's criticism of the war
events.wd_description: Bondarev called the war an aggressive move by Putin driven by lies, warmongering, and hatred, and noted that other diplomats feel similarly but are unlikely to speak out.
events.description: Bondarev called the war an aggressive move by Putin driven by lies, warmongering, and hatred, and noted that other diplomats feel similarly but are unlikely to speak out.

events.name: Reactions to Bondarev's resignation
events.wd_description: Hillel Neuer, executive director of UN Watch, commended Bondarev and urged other diplomats to follow his example.
events.description: Hillel Neuer, executive director of UN Watch, commended Bondarev and urged other diplomats to follow his example.

events.name: Bondarev's future considerations
events.wd_description: When asked about returning to Russia, Bondarev indicated that it would not be a good idea right now.
events.description: When asked about returning to Russia, Bondarev indicated that it would not be a good idea right now.

events.name: Ukraine's EU candidate status recommendation
events.wd_description: Ukraine's bid to join the European Union received a boost as the European Commission recommended the country for candidate status due to Russia's invasion.
events.description: Ukraine's bid to join the European Union received a boost as the European Commission recommended the country for candidate status due to Russia's invasion.

events.name: European Commission recommendation
events.wd_description: The European Commission President, Ursula von der Leyen, announced the recommendation for Ukraine to be given candidate status, contingent on further reforms.
events.description: The European Commission President, Ursula von der Leyen, announced the recommendation for Ukraine to be given candidate status, contingent on further reforms.

events.name: Moldova's candidate status
events.wd_description: The commission also recommended candidate status for Ukraine's neighbor, Moldova.
events.description: The commission also recommended candidate status for Ukraine's neighbor, Moldova.

events.name: Upcoming EU summit
events.wd_description: Leaders of the 27 EU member states are set to meet for a summit next week to discuss their options.
events.description: Leaders of the 27 EU member states are set to meet for a summit next week to discuss their options.

events.name: Zelensky's statement
events.wd_description: Volodymyr Zelensky stated at a press conference that Russia's attack on Ukraine amounted to an attack on all of Europe. The German Chancellor, French President, and Italian Prime Minister were present at the conference.
events.description: Volodymyr Zelensky stated at a press conference that Russia's attack on Ukraine amounted to an attack on all of Europe. The German Chancellor, French President, and Italian Prime Minister were present at the conference.

events.name: GM Cobalt Sourcing Agreement
events.wd_description: GM has signed a multi-year sourcing agreement for cobalt supply from Glencore’s mining operation in Australia to support its EV battery production.
events.description: GM has signed a multi-year sourcing agreement for cobalt supply from Glencore’s mining operation in Australia to support its EV battery production.

events.name: Cobalt Supply Agreement
events.wd_description: GM signed a multi-year sourcing agreement with Glencore for cobalt from their mining operation in Australia.
events.description: GM signed a multi-year sourcing agreement with Glencore for cobalt from their mining operation in Australia.

events.name: Use in Ultium Batteries
events.wd_description: The cobalt sourced from Australia will be used in GM’s Ultium battery cathodes for models like the Chevrolet Silverado EV, GMC Hummer EV, and Cadillac LYRIQ.
events.description: The cobalt sourced from Australia will be used in GM’s Ultium battery cathodes for models like the Chevrolet Silverado EV, GMC Hummer EV, and Cadillac LYRIQ.

events.name: Responsible Sourcing Initiative
events.wd_description: Both GM and Glencore are members of the Responsible Minerals Initiative, focusing on secure and sustainable sourcing of critical raw materials.
events.description: Both GM and Glencore are members of the Responsible Minerals Initiative, focusing on secure and sustainable sourcing of critical raw materials.
